description: This file defines a React component for a recipe detail page in a Next.js application. It dynamically loads a recipe based on route parameters, displays the recipe's image, title, tags, description, and price, and provides interface elements to add or update the recipe in a shopping cart context.

methods.name: RecipeDetailPage
methods.description: A React functional component that retrieves a recipe based on route parameters and renders the RecipeDetail component.

methods.name: RecipeDetail
methods.description: A React component that displays detailed information about a recipe, and interface controls for adding to or updating the cart.
